title: Councilmembers Herbold & Lewis discuss homelessness, public safety & more
description:
How is the Seattle City Council reacting to what the police department calls a "staffing crisis"? Will a new investment in shelter services have an impact on homelessness in Seattle? And, how will a new law that allows at-home businesses affect your neighborhood? Councilmembers Lisa Herbold and Andrew J. Lewis answer these questions and the ones you're sending in, too, on Council Edition!

View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy
